page.title: 11SHEPTON ROUND TABLE
page.content: THE MOTTO OF ROUND TABLE IS 'TO TAKE UP SOMETHING AND TO IMPROVE.' THEY MEET EVERY FIRST,THIRD AND FIFTH MONDAY OF THE MONTH AND THEY RAISE MONEY BY DOING EVENTS AND THE EMBLEM IS THE DESIGN LIKE THE FAMOUS ROUND TABLE WHICH HANGS IN THE GREAT HALL IN WINCHESTER AND USED TO BE THE ROUND TABLE OF KING ARTHUR.EVERY YEAR THE PEOPLE ON THE COMITTE HAVE TO BE RE-ELECTION.THEY DO THIS BY SECRET BALLOT.THEY ALSO GO TO PLACE'S OF INTEREST. AND THEY INVITE SPEAKER TO TALK ABOUT THERE FAVOURITE SUBJECTS. AND THEY RAISED THE MONEY AND GIVE IT TO CHARITY.
